contents.text: A travel consultant is introducing Christian cruises to travelers.
contents.text_zh: 一位旅游顾问正在向游人们介绍基督教游船。

contents.text: There has been large increase in Christian theme cruises over the last few years， in large part due to the incredible popularity of cruising in general. Christian cruises are popular with those who are not interested in the drinking gambling and Las Vegas style shows that are part of most cruising vacations.
contents.text_zh: 在过去的几年里，基督教主题巡游项目之所以越来越热，大部部分原因是人们普遍的对巡游异乎寻常的欢迎程度。基督教巡游受到了那些对酗酒、赌博和看拉斯维加斯风格演出不感兴趣的人们的欢迎，而这些娱乐形式一直以来，都是大多数巡游度假的一部分内容。

contents.text: Templeton Tours， based in North Carolina， is perhaps the best known Christian tour operator. Having reserved the entire ship, they shut down the slot machines, ban smoking throughout the ship,and replace the showgirls with Christian entertainers. You can choose from variety of themes,  including Gospel music cruises and Bible study tours.  Most of their tours cruise through the Bahamas, but they are featuring an Alaskan cruise this summer.  Prices range between$700  and $1,000 per person for 4 nights in the Bahamas,excluding airfare to the departure point.
contents.text_zh: 总部设在北卡罗莱纳州的坦普利滕旅游公司，是最有名的基督教旅游项目的承办者。他们预订整条游船后，关闭了船上的赌博机，禁止在船上抽烟，用基督教演艺人员替代了歌舞女郎。你可以从各种各样的主题娱乐形式进行选择，包括福音音乐旅游小组和圣经学习旅游小组。不过，今年夏天，大多数穿越巴哈马群岛游船的特色是巡游阿拉斯加。在巴哈马群岛过4夜的旅游价格每从700美金到10美金不等，不包括离港的机票费用。

contents.text: First Century Voyages, a Christian tour operator also based in North Carolina, offers glamorous cruising experience.  Enjoy retracing the journeys of the apostle Paul in Turkey and Greece on luxurious tall sailing ship. Prices are considerably higher— the cheapest accommodations are about $4,200 per person for an -day cruise, excluding airfare to the departure point in Turkey or Greece.  But the quality of the amenities and the guest speakers simply cannot be topped. First Century offers cruises within the Caribbean and Atlantic as well.
contents.text_zh: 一个总部设在北卡莱纳州的基督教游船承办者一第一世纪航海旅游公司，也为人们提供令人着迷的旅游体验。坐在高大奢华的帆船上，在土耳其和希腊能体验耶稣的门徒保罗的旅行经历。其价格相当高—11天游最便宜的食宿费用为每人4200美金，不包括离开土耳其或希腊的机票。然而，仅仅是当地的环境质量和特约演讲人的素养多是无法匹敌的。第一世纪还提供环绕加勒比海和大西洋巡逻的服务项目。

contents.text: For a wide range of Christian tour options,  including cruises,  you can also contact GTI travel in Holland,Michigan, GTI is travel agency that has worked hard to add Christian travel options to their list of offerings, and they have a reputation for doing it well . Their trips are filled quickly by travelers throughout the country .You might also contact your local travel agent . Due to the popularity ofChristian cruising you may find that she has long list of options.
contents.text_zh: 关于更多的基督教旅游项目其中包括巡游项目等选择而言，你还以选择与位千密歌根州荷兰市的GTI旅游公司联系。GTI是一家致力于将基督教旅游这一选项，添加到他们所提供的服务项目中去的旅游代理机构。并且他们因表现出色而获得了良好的声誉。全国各地报名参加此项目的游人非常火爆。你也可以与当地的旅行社联系。鉴于基督教旅游项目的流行普及，你还会发现关于此项旅游方案的众多选择。
